Verify the hero image 'widget_hero.jpg' is loaded, has natural dimensions 1200x900px, and alt text 'Premium Widget'
Verify the 'Add to Cart' button is visible, enabled, has background color #007bff, border radius 8px, padding 10px 20px, and font weight 600
Verify the shopping cart icon displays count 0 items
Verify the 'Username' input field has placeholder 'Enter your username', current value 'john.doe', 1px solid border in color #cccccc
Click the 'Username' input field
Verify it becomes focused with border color #007bff
Verify the 'Email' input is disabled, visible, and has background color #f0f0f0
Verify the profile picture 'user_avatar.png' is loaded, has rendered dimensions 100x100px, and displays 'Demo' watermark at its bottom right
Verify the 'Save Changes' button has text 'Save Changes', background color #6c757d, opacity 1
Verify the 'Save Changes' button transitions background to #5a6268 over 200ms on hover
Set viewport width to 1024px
Verify the main navigation bar menu item 'Home' has text 'Home', font size 16px, color #007bff, and padding 10px 15px
Verify the 'About Us' item, when active, has background color #e9ecef and font weight 600
Verify the search input field has placeholder 'Search products...', width 200px, height 36px, and corner radius 4px
Verify the 'Contact' menu item is positioned 80px from the left edge and 40px from the right edge of its parent container
Verify the hamburger menu icon is hidden
Open 'https://videosite.com/tutorial/setup-guide'
Verify the video player is visible, has width 75% of the viewport, height 400px, is not muted by default, and can enter fullscreen mode when the 'Fullscreen' button is clicked
Verify the video content 'setup_video.mp4' is loaded and its initial load time is under 1.5s
Verify the playback controls have background color rgba(0,0,0,0.7) and text color #ffffff
Verify the play button's shape is a triangle with side length 20px
Verify the 'Login' button is enabled, visible, has text 'Login', background color #007bff, and font family 'Roboto'
Verify the 'Forgot Password?' link has color #007bff and is aligned to the right
Verify the password input field has placeholder 'Password', text size 14px, and border 1px solid #ced4da
Verify the entire login form has padding 20px, border radius 5px, and top position 100px from the viewport top
Verify the data table has exactly 10 rows displayed
Verify each row has height 48px
Verify the 'Name' column header has text 'Name', font weight 700, and text align 'left'
Verify hovering over any row changes its background color to #f8f9fa within a 150ms transition
Verify the 'Status' column cells display either 'Active' or 'Inactive'
Verify 'Active' status has color #28a745
Verify the table has 1px solid border in color #dee2e6
Open the 'Confirm Delete' dialog
Verify it is visible, centered horizontally and vertically, has width 400px, height 200px, opacity 1, and border radius 8px
Verify the dialog's title 'Confirm Action' has font size 20px and color #333333
Verify the 'Cancel' button has background color #6c757d and 10px padding
Verify the 'Delete' button has background color #dc3545 and font weight 600
Open 'https://photos.com/gallery/landscape'
Verify the image gallery contains 5 thumbnail images
Verify each thumbnail is loaded, rendered as 150x100px, and has 2px solid border in color #eeeeee
Verify the main gallery image 'full_landscape.jpg' has alt text 'Beautiful Landscape' and its load time is less than 800ms
Verify the 'Next' button is enabled, visible, and has aria-label 'Next image'
Verify the gallery viewport has scroll-left 0 initially
Verify the calendar widget is visible, has background color #ffffff, width 300px, and margin 15px from all sides
Verify the current date '2023-10-27' is highlighted with font weight 700 and background color #007bff
Verify the 'Previous Month' button is enabled and has aria-label 'Go to previous month'
Verify the dates are displayed with font size 14px and color #333333
Trigger a 'Success' notification
Verify the banner appears at the top right, has background color #d4edda, color #155724, text 'Item added successfully.', padding 16px, and border radius 4px
Verify it is visible for exactly 3s before becoming hidden
Verify the banner's opacity transitions from 0 to 1 over 300ms upon appearance
Verify the banner's opacity transitions from 1 to 0 over 500ms upon disappearance
Click the 'Options' button
Verify the dropdown menu appears, is positioned directly below the button, has width 180px, 1px solid border in color #cccccc, border radius 4px, and scroll-top 0 when first opened
Verify each menu item has font size 15px and padding 8px 12px
Verify the 'Settings' option, when active, has background color #f0f0f0 and font weight 500
Verify the 'General' tab is selected, displays text 'General', has background color #ffffff, and font weight 600
Verify other tabs like 'Security' have background color #e9ecef and color #6c757d
Verify the content area below the tabs has padding 20px and its top edge aligns with the bottom of the tabs
Verify the tab container has 1px border on its bottom edge in color #dee2e6
Verify clicking a new tab triggers a content animation taking 400ms
Verify the 'Subscribe to Newsletter' checkbox is visible, unchecked by default, has border 1px solid #ced4da, width 18px, height 18px, and is left-aligned with its label
Verify its associated label 'Subscribe to Newsletter' has font size 14px and color #333333
Verify when checked, the checkbox element's background color becomes #007bff and it displays a checkmark symbol

Verify when data is loading, the loading spinner is visible, centered on the screen (x viewport_center, y viewport_center), has 'spin' animation of 1s linear infinite, color #007bff, width 50px, height 50px, opacity 0.8, no border, and aria-label 'Loading content'
Verify after 2s, the spinner becomes hidden

Verify the progress bar is visible, has width 80% of its parent container, height 20px, background color #e9ecef, border radius 10px, text '75% Complete' centered with color #ffffff, and x position 10px from the left
Verify the filled portion of the bar has background color #28a745 and reflects the current value of 75%
Verify the breadcrumb navigation is visible at the top left of the page
Verify each breadcrumb link, e.g., 'Home', has font size 13px, color #007bff, and padding 0 5px
Verify the last item 'Current Page' is not a link, has font weight 600, and color #6c757d
Verify the breadcrumb separator character '>' has color #6c757d
Verify the entire breadcrumb container has bottom margin 20px
Verify the footer is visible at the bottom of the page, has background color #343a40, height 100px, and its content is text-aligned 'center'
Verify all footer links, such as 'Privacy Policy', have text color #ffffff and font size 14px
Verify hovering over a link changes its text color to #cccccc within a 100ms transition
Verify the 'Contact Us' link has margin-right 20px and label attribute 'Contact page'
Verify the star rating component displays 5 stars in a row, has aria-label 'Current rating is 4 out of 5', and stars are aligned to the left
Verify each star is 20px wide, 20px high, and has left padding 5px
Verify 4 out of 5 stars are filled with color #ffc107, indicating value 4
Verify empty stars have color #e4e5e9
Verify the 'Choose File' button for file upload is visible, enabled, has text 'Choose File', and background color #6c757d
Verify the associated file name display area has placeholder 'No file chosen' and font size 14px
Verify the upload icon 'upload.svg' is loaded, displayed to the left of the button, and has rendered dimensions 16x16px
Verify the input field has 1px dashed border of color #cccccc, opacity 1, and bottom margin 10px

Verify the code snippet block for 'example.js' is visible, has background color #f8f9fa, padding 15px, 1px solid border in color #dee2e6, width 600px, and y position 200px from the top of the viewport
Verify the code text inside has font family 'monospace', font size 13px, and color #333333
Verify the 'Copy to Clipboard' button is enabled, visible, has background color #007bff, and border radius 3px
